name: replace
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cleantalk.
Tool description: CleanTalk API is a content validation service that helps you filter out profanity and obscenity in your user-generated content. 
API description: Sends a request to the CleanTalk API to process and replace certain elements in the given text.

text.description: The text to be processed by the CleanTalk API.
text.default: What the fuck are you doing?
